item.title: SZA Disses 'Stupid' Tory Lanez Supporters in Megan Thee Stallion's Honor
item.description: SZA is sticking by her homegirl Megan Thee Stallion ... and telling Tory Lanez supporters to either get their man'z to file something in court or STFU...
